official-title.#text: To authorize borrowers of loans under the William D. Ford Federal Direct Loan Program to modify the interest rate of such loans to be equal to the interest rate for such loans at the time of modification.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

committee-name.#text: Committee on Education and the Workforce

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: is amended by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Section 455(b) of the Higher Education Act of 1965

header.#text: Borrower modification of interest rates under the William D. Ford Federal Direct Loan Program

text.#text: Notwithstanding the preceding paragraphs of this subsection, the borrower of a Federal Direct Stafford Loan, a Federal Direct Unsubsidized Stafford Loan, a Federal Direct PLUS Loan, or a Federal Direct Consolidation Loan may elect to modify the interest rate of the loan to be equal to the interest rate that would be applicable to such loan if such loan were first disbursed (or in the case of a Federal Direct Consolidation Loan, first applied for) on the date on which such borrower elects to modify the interest rate of such loan.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: for a loan shall be fixed for the life of the loan.
at any time during the life of the loan.

text.#text: A borrower may elect to modify the interest rate of a loan in accordance with

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 3047 IH: To authorize borrowers of loans under the William D. Ford Federal Direct Loan Program to modify the interest rate of such loans to be equal to the interest rate for such loans at the time of modification.
